javascript/object_get.html.title: 获取对象路径处的值_.get(object, a.b.c, default)
javascript/object_get.html.body: 获取对象路径处的值_.get(object, 'a.b.c', 'default'); Gets the value at path of object. If the resolved value is undefined, the defaultValue is returned in its place. %accordion%点击查看结果%accordion% var object = { 'a': { 'b': { 'c': 3 } } }; function get(object, path, defaults) { if (object === null) return defaults; let index = 0; const arr = path.split('.'); while (arr[index] && object[arr[index]]) { object = object[arr[index]]; index += 1; } return index && index === arr.length ? object : undefined; }; console.info(get(object, 'a.b.c')); %/accordion% 延伸： lodash _.get方法了解 结构取值const {a:{b:{c}}} = object; try catch Copyright © tjubao all right reserved，powered by Gitbook该文件修订时间： 2019-09-20 18:57:15

javascript/null.html.title: [typeof null, null instanceof Object]表达式的返回值是什么？
javascript/null.html.body: [typeof null, null instanceof Object]表达式的返回值是什么？ [typeof null, null instanceof Object] %accordion%点击查看结果%accordion% ["object", false] %/accordion% 延伸： 基本类型 Boolean Number String Null Undefined BigInt Symbol null(薛定谔的对象) 与 undefined的区别 是一个字面量，它不像undefined 是全局对象的一个属性。null 是表示缺少的标识，指示变量未指向任何对象 Number(null)输出为0, Number(undefined)输出为NaN typeof instanceof Object.getPrototypeOf() Copyright © tjubao all right reserved，powered by Gitbook该文件修订时间： 2019-09-20 18:58:54

javascript/array.map.parseInt.html.title: ["1", "2", "3"].map(parseInt) 返回值是什么？
javascript/array.map.parseInt.html.body: ["1", "2", "3"].map(parseInt) 返回值是什么？ var new_array = arr.map(function callback(currentValue[, index[, array]]) { // Return element for new_array }[, thisArg]) %accordion%点击查看结果%accordion% 1, NaN, NaN %/accordion% 延伸： map语法 parseInt(string, radix) 当未指定radix时，不同的实现会产生不同的结果，通常认为其值默认为10 Copyright © tjubao all right reserved，powered by Gitbook该文件修订时间： 2019-09-20 18:59:28
